minesweeper.minesweeper difficulty: Lists the details of each difficulty
minesweeper.minesweeper new <difficulty>: Creates a new minesweeper board of <difficulty>.
minesweeper.minesweeper open <x> <y>: Opens the cell (<x>,<y>) on your minesweeper board.
minesweeper.minesweeper flag <x> <y>: Flags the cell (<x>,<y>) on your minesweeper board.
minesweeper.minesweeper unflag <x> <y>: Unflags the cell (<x>,<y>) on your minesweeper board.

cryptomine.cryptomine list: Lists all mines you currently have.
cryptomine.cryptomine shop: List all sellable items and their prices.
cryptomine.cryptomine upgrade <id> <level>: Upgrades your <id>-th mine by <level> level, or until you run out of materials.
cryptomine.cryptomine sell <id>: Sells your <id>-th mine, refunding 90% of all gascoins spent on the mine.
cryptomine.cryptomine harvest: Harvests all the mines you currently have.

item.item shop: List the sell prices of all items.
item.item inventory: List all the items you currently have.

userinfo.userinfo hamehistory <player>: Lists the Minecraft name history of <player>.

wikipedia.wikipedia search <title>: Searches for articles with <title> on Wikipedia.

hypixel.hypixel keycheck: Queries if the Hypixel API key of bot is valid, and how many query quota is left.
hypixel.hypixel status <player>: Queries the online status of <player> in Hypixel Network.

spam.spam <message> <amount>: Spams <message> <amount> amount of times. (WARNING: spamming is bad)

mute.mute <user> <duration>: If <user> has ongoing mute, extend it by <duration> seconds. Otherwise mute <user> for <duration> seconds.
